Class CommentController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bounswe.group7.web.controller.CommentController

  • @RestController
public class CommentController
extends Object
    Handles comment functionalities like adding, deleting and voting comment.

    Batuhan

                method=PUT,
                produces="application/json",
                consumes="application/json")
 @ResponseBody
public String addComment(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                                                                                                                                                                                        @RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                                                                        com.bounswe.group7.model.Comments comment)
        Receives comment from AJAX request. Adds it to the database using client methods. After addition, gets every comment of that topic and returns them in the wanted form.
        Parameters:

        comment -
        Returns:

      • deleteComment

        @RequestMapping(value="/deletecomment",
                method=DELETE,
                produces="application/json",
                consumes="application/json")
 @ResponseBody
public String deleteComment(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                 @RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                                                                                 DeleteComment comment)
        Receives comment id and topic id in a domain called DeleteComment from AJAX request. Deletes that comment and returns the comments of that topic
        Parameters:
        request -
        comment - -> comment_id and topic_id
        Returns:
        topic's_comments

      • voteComment

        @RequestMapping(value="/votecomment",
                method=POST,
                produces="application/json",
                consumes="application/json")
 @ResponseBody
public int voteComment(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                                                                                                                                                                                        @RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                                                                        CommentVote commentVote)
        Receives the type of vote (up/down) and comment id in a domain called CommentVote by an AJAX request. Updates the votes of the comment and returns total vote of that comment.
        Parameters:
        request -
        commentVote - -> type and comment_id
        Returns:
        vote
